forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine this morning followed by increasing clouds and a few showers this afternoon. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near -5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 25F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 19F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 21F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late at night. Low -3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 29F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 20-30cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 26F with temps rising to near freezing. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to snow showers for the afternoon. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to snow showers for the afternoon. Morning high of 38F with temps falling to near 30. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 20-30cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 20F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 21F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
